title: Terrible app. IMAP impossible to crossover to browser
text: After being fed up with the outlook mail app bc I wasn‚Äôt able to add a new folder (I would press ‚Äúadd new‚Äù and then it would immediately disappear), wasn‚Äôt able to sort my mail or change the view of how I saw the full email, I tried to log into the browser on my iPad Pro. It also continued to log me out every week and input the additional IMAP advanced settings which is super annoying. I wasn‚Äôt able to log in with any IMAP on my browser, it didn‚Äôt even recognize my account that I log into regularly. It shouldn‚Äôt be this complicated. Were in 2024. Gmail has never had these issues and I wish so badly my company didn‚Äôt use outlook. Please hire some skilled people back and fix your apps. I shouldn‚Äôt have to waste so much time trying to log in and sort my emails.

title: student opinion

title: Too basic
text:
Missing many basic features: - can‚Äôt subscribe to internet calendars (kids sports games) - doesn‚Äôt intelligently offer folders to file messages like Apple does. This is important when you have hundreds of folders 

Deleting a message in a thread is mind numbing.  Most time I accidentally delete the whole thread of emails. This is a major miss - no swipe to delete individual email in a thread. You have to click the 3 little dots and hope you delete the right message in a thread. 

Not possible to move a message in a thread to a folder. How did they miss this?

Contact management is impossible. I have so many duplicates in my phone and all of them have this dumb outlook link to a webpage. They‚Äôve ruined thousands of contacts 

Notifications don‚Äôt work. I will often get 3 popups of the same email. New email notification count on the app icon is always wrong. I‚Äôve never once opened the app to have it match the number of new emails to the number notification on the app icon 

Can‚Äôt collapse folders when filing a message. Have to scroll through hundreds of folders to file messages away 

If my company did not force me to use this, it would not take up useless space in my phone. I have tried for 4 years to make this app work but it stinks. Fix the basics!!!
